name: example
description: Example project voor the mithril-markdown library.

scripts.build:domain: rm -fr ../../docs && parcel build index.html --out-dir ../../docs --public-url https://erikvullings.github.io/mithril-markdown && cp favicon.ico ../../docs/
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build index.html

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com>
